title: The Joys of Juneteenth | Nicole Taylor
description:
Referenced in this episode 

  • Watermelon and Red Birds: A Cookbook for Juneteenth and Other Black Celebrations
  • Nicole Taylor on Instagram

Genius-Hunter Extra Credit

  • The Up South Cookbook: Chasing Dixie in a Brooklyn Kitchen

Have a genius recipe you'd like to share? Tell me all about it at genius@food52.com.

Theme Music by The Cabinetmaker on Blue Dot Sessions
author: podcasts@food52.com (Kristen Miglore, Nicole Taylor)

itunes:title: The Joys of Juneteenth | Nicole Taylor
itunes:author: Kristen Miglore, Nicole Taylor
itunes:summary: On this episode, Kristen sits down with Nicole Taylor to discuss her newest book, Watermelon and Red Birds: A Cookbook for Juneteenth and Other Black Celebrations, which is filled with recipes for summer gatherings, stories and essays that honor the legacy of Juneteenth.
itunes:subtitle: On this episode, Kristen sits down with Nicole Taylor to discuss her newest book, Watermelon and Red Birds: A Cookbook for Juneteenth and Other Black Celebrations, which is filled with recipes for summer gatherings, stories and essays that honor the legacy of Juneteenth.
